verbs.description: In [V: trying] [ARG1: to defend Donald Trump against the amorphous media] , [ARG0: Pat Robertson] engaged in a breathtaking bit of psychological projection , accusing Trump ’s critics of the thing that Trump himself is most flagrantly guilty of on a daily — hell , hourly — basis .
